samples.name: Pokedex Website
samples.description: A simple Pokedex (an encyclopedia for the video game series Pokemon) to practice Vue router and fetching data from an open source RestfulAPI.

samples.name: Forecast Website
samples.description: A website to display weather and waves forecast for surfing. I handled the front-end part only. The source code for this project is confidential.

samples.name: Http Listener & Process Monitor Script
samples.description: A lightweight script to listen to webhooks from an IoT network server and a monitoring script that sends email if the listener failed.

samples.name: NakFit
samples.description: A 2d motion-controlled video game with for Noizucon 2024 convention booth. Players physically squat to move the character using.

samples.name: Blocks
samples.description: A 3d first-person video game with combination of action and puzzle elements. This project focuses on using Unreal Engine 5 and its physics engine.

samples.name: RPG Battle Systems Using Gyroscope
samples.description: My Degree's Final Year Project. A 3d action adventure mobile video game that implements gyroscope inputs from a smartphone device.

samples.name: Restaurant Menu System
samples.description: A simple menu system developed to practice Java Swing. This system allows users to browse the menu, add items to a cart, and simulate payments.

samples.name: Vaccination Distribution System
samples.description: A simulation platform where users, officers, and vaccination centers can sign in and manage vaccination-related processes.
